label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_022
content:
## 2024-07-29 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 125
- Active: 116
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 30
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 9

#### By Dose Group
- Low Dose: 29
- Mid Dose: 31
- High Dose: 32
- Placebo: 33

### Immunogenicity By Group
#### Low Dose
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 59.3
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 16.1
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 96.7
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 146.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 15.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 102.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 11.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 27.5

#### Mid Dose
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 97.2
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 30.3
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 153.1
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 236.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 166.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 18.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 41.6

#### High Dose
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 136.3
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 43.9
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 210.0
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 308.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 33.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 224.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 51.7

#### Placebo
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 7.0
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 5.9
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 11.2
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 20.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 3.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 14.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 2.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 4.3

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 36.1
- Erythema Percentage: 29.8
- Swelling Percentage: 19.6
- Induration Percentage: 5.5
- Mean Pain Duration (Hours): 32.5

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 11.0
- Fatigue Percentage: 28.3
- Myalgia Percentage: 20.3
- Headache Percentage: 23.2
- Chills Percentage: 12.5

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K) Mean: 8.9
- WBC (K) SD: 1.4
- Lymphocyte Percentage Mean: 37.5
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 5.4
- Neutrophil Percentage Mean: 47.8
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 9.5
- Platelets (K) Mean: 253
- Platelets (K) SD: 40
- CRP (mg/L) Mean: 7.1
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 1.3
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.8
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.1

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-2255, Description: myalgia, Grade: 1, Relatedness: related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2265, Description: fever, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose

### Events
- Serology samples shipped to central immunology lab
- Immunology core lab QC report received
- Immunology core lab QC report received

### Notes
- Week 22: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 125 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
